Characteristic.name: CGM Session Start Time

Field.name: Session Start Time
Field.InformativeText: Same format as the Date Time Characteristic, smallest unit in seconds

Field.name: Time Zone
Field.InformativeText: Same format as the Time Zone Characteristic

Field.name: DST-Offset
Field.InformativeText: Same format as the DST Offset Characteristic

Field.name: E2E-CRC
Field.InformativeText: If the device supports E2E-safety (E2E-CRC-Supported bit is set in CGM Feature), the session start time is secured by a CRC calculated over all fields.

Characteristic.Note: C1: Mandatory if device supports E2E-CRC (Bit 12 is set in CGM Feature) otherwise excluded. The fields in the above table are in the order of LSO to MSO. Where LSO = Least Significant Octet and MSO = Most Significant Octet
